metadata.title: CVE-2023-5061 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting from9.3 before 16.4.4, all versions starting from 16.5 before 16.5.4, allversions starting from 16.6 before 16.6.2. In certain situations, it mayhave been possible for developers to override predefined CI variables viathe REST API.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
